amendment.description: To establish a reserve fund to allow for deficit-neutral legislation that would provide seniors with a prescription drug benefit option that is affordable, user-friendly, and administered directly by the Secretary of Health and Human Services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3164 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 60. Record Vote Number: 71.

action.text: Amendment SA 3164 proposed by Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S2266-2267; text: CR S2266) To establish a reserve fund to allow for deficit-neutral legislation that would provide seniors with a prescription drug benefit option that is affordable, user-friendly, and administered directly by the Secretary of Health and Human Services.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3164 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3164 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 60. Record Vote Number: 71.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3164 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 60. Record Vote Number: 71.
